original_text: If that is true, what do you say about your own disciples? They also send bad spirits out of people. You would not say that it is Satan's power that helps them. So your own people show that you are wrong about this.
korean_text: 내가 바알세불을 힘입어 귀신을 쫓아내면 너희 아들들은 누구를 힘입어 쫓아내느냐 그러므로 그들이 너희 재판관이 되리라

sentences.original_text: what do you say about your own disciples?
They also send bad spirits out of people.
You would not say that it is Satan's power
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그것이 사탄의 힘이라고 말하지 않을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: So your own people show that you are wrong about this.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신의 자기 사람들이 당신이 이 점에서 틀렸음을 보여줍니다.
